question: Your next-door neighbour likes to listen to music late at night. Because of the loud music, you often lose sleep.Write a letter to the building manager. In your letterdescribe the situationexplain the problems it is causing youoffer at least one solution
text: I am writing this letter to let you know about The Noise Pollution by neighbour in the Midnight.It caused serious disturbance to sleep.

I am staying in The Tulip Apartment,Flat Number:109 for 2 Years along with my family.I am working as a Manager in one of the construction companies and will go to the office at 8:00 AM and come back at 9:30 PM.Due to my busy schedule in office ,I go to bed very early after finishing dinner.From last week,There is a loud noise from my next apartment.However ,I did not distrubed for first two days.It continued day after another.However,I frustrated and informed them to reduce volume.But they did not listen to my words and continued the activity.Due to this,I am physically distrubed and could not able to concentrate on work as well as children's were distracted on their education.

I am requesting you to take immediate action on this issue and send them notice about issue caused due to their irresponsibility.To avoid such scenerio,I recommend to stick a notice in information board as well as bring a discussion in monthly members meeting.
I look forward to get prompt response from you on this case
